member.name: CERT_ECC_SIGNATURE
member.summary: The CERT_ECC_SIGNATURE structure contains the r and s values for an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) signature.

member.name: CERT_ECC_SIGNATURE.r
member.summary: The r value of the ECDSA signature. This value is in little-endian order.

member.name: CERT_ECC_SIGNATURE.s
member.summary: The s value of the ECDSA signature. This value is in little-endian order.
